sections.summary: results-oriented accountant with strong work ethic and over four years of experience.â successful at managing multiple projects and consistently meeting deadlines under pressure. bi-lingual in english and spanish with outstanding analytical, oral and written communication skills across all levels of the organization. extensive knowledge of accounting software and processes.
